    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddElementCommand
    Command implementation for adding a new music band to the collection.
    AddIfMinCommand
    Command implementation for adding a new music band only if its ID is less than the minimum.
    Album
    Represents an album with a name and sales figure.
    App
    Main entry point for the Music Band Collection application.
    AverageParticipantsCommand
    Command implementation for calculating the average number of participants.
    CleanHeapCommand
    Command implementation for clearing all elements from the collection.
    CliRunner
    CLI runner that manages the command-line interface loop.
    CollectionFileManager
    Manages file operations for loading and saving the music band collection.
    CollectionFileManager.LoadResult
    Result object for load operations containing success status, loaded bands, and warnings.
    CollectionFileManager.SaveResult
    Result object for save operations containing success status and details.
    Command
    Interface for all command implementations in the application.
    CommandManager
    Manager class responsible for parsing and routing user commands to the appropriate invoker methods.
    Coordinates
    Represents a 2D coordinate system with x and y values.
    CountByParticipantsCommand
    Command implementation for counting elements by number of participants.
    ExecuteScriptCommand
    Command implementation for executing commands from a script file.
    ExitCommand
    Command implementation for exiting the application.
    HelpCommand
    Command implementation for displaying help information.
    Invoker
    Invoker class that acts as a central hub for executing commands.
    ListEverythingCommand
    Command implementation for listing all elements in the collection.
    ListInfoCommand
    Command implementation for displaying collection information.
    ListMetaData
    Command implementation for listing collection metadata.
    LoadCommand
    Command implementation for loading the collection from a file.
    MinHeap
    Singleton class representing a MinHeap data structure for storing MusicBand objects.
    MusicBand
    Represents a music band with all its attributes.
    MusicGenre
    Represents the genre of a music band.
    ParticipantsByIdCommand
    Command implementation for displaying the number of participants for a specific band.
    RemoveByBestAlbumCommand
    Command implementation for removing a music band by its best album name.
    RemoveByIdCommand
    Command implementation for removing a music band from the collection by its ID.
    RemoveGreaterThanIdCommand
    Command implementation for removing all music bands with ID greater than a specified value.
    SaveCommand
    Command implementation for saving the collection to a file.
    ScriptInputStream
    Custom InputStream implementation that reads from a list of strings.
    ShowHistoryCommand
    Command implementation for displaying command history.
    UpdateElementCommand
    Command implementation for updating an existing music band in the collection.
